net.tc.utils
Class HTML

java.lang.Object
  net.tc.utils.HTML

public class HTML
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class for working with HTML. Methods that take Object as a parameter will extract the String representation of the object by either casting to String or by calling the Object's toString() method.

Title: ISMA

Description:

Parameters:
